name: forest nightmers
description:
GamePlay:

forest nightmers is 2d platforms game,it gives the possibility to jump, run and solve puzzles.

Story:

 a person stuck in a dark forest and he trying to get out of it by any way possible.

Teams:

Forest nightmers is devlopped by QuarksGames.

Teams members: 

layadi abderaouf:  Official Instagram Account

layadi fouad : Official facebook account.

Controls:

Arrow keys(Rghit,left).

Space to jump.

y to dash.

Enter to pause.
